requirements.value: Allows the plan definition to be referenced by a single globally unique identifier. This version of the profile requires url where the library of PlanDefinitions are stored.
Allows externally provided and/or usable business identifiers to be easily associated with the module. This version of the profile requires at least one identifier.

comment.value: MUST follow Major.Minor.Patch version format based on FHIR versioning guidance

requirements.value: This version of the profile requires specifying the version of this PlanDefinition. This version of the profile requires specifying the version of this PlanDefinition. MUST follow Major.Minor.Patch version format based on FHIR versioning guidance
Support human navigation and code generation. This version of the profile requires the name of the PlanDefinition
This version of the profile requires a title which is used in an UI.
This version of the profile requires a date for when the PlanDefinition was last changed
This version of the profile requires a description of the PlanDefinition.

Assist in searching for appropriate content. This version of the profile requires a useContext which is used to discover. PlanDefinitions of similar useContext. Will be used to drive searches related to the patientâ€™s condition.

comment.value: If specified, this date follows the original approval date. This version of the profile requires a date when the PlanDefinition was last reviewed.
If url is not specified, there must be one relatedArtifact with type iderivedFrom

requirements.value: type of derived-from must be used when the planDefinition.url is not specifid
This version of the profile requires the concept the PlanDefinition.goal addresses.
This version of the profile requires action. An action may have in-line details or reference an ActivityDefinition of a PlanDefinition.
This version of the profile requires a title of the action (ActivityDefinitions).
This version of the profile requires a description of the action (ActivityDefinitions).

description.value: Participant role function on the care team

requirements.value: This version of the profile requires ActivityDefinitions referenced by the PlanDefinition
